product_name: Green Guru Touring Townie Handelbar Bag
long_description: Sourced from upcycled materials and stitched together with high-quality worksmanship, the Green Guru Touring Townie Handelbar Bag mounts on your handlebars and keeps contents secure while you ride.
short_description: Sourced from upcycled materials and stitched together with high-quality worksmanship, the Green Guru Touring Townie Handelbar Bag mounts on your handlebars and keeps contents secure while you ride.
